Sinopse: After the events of The Wog Boy (2000), Steve Karamitsis and Frank, his best mate from Melbourne, find themselves treading water, desperately trying to break a dry spell. However, things will take an unexpected turn when Steve receives a phone call from his unknown cousin Jimis, informing him that he has inherited a prime beach-front property on the cosmopolitan island of Mykonos, Greece, from an uncle he's never met. Convinced he has struck it rich, Steve catches the first plane to Mykonos, only to find himself up against the local mentality and a wolf in sheep's clothing bent on getting his hands on the beach worth millions.—Nick Riganas
